AboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
AboutMe.about_me_info: Hi, I'm Ernar, and I'm developing in the world of IT. I was born in Kazakhstan and live in Almaty. Always dreamed of being a programmer. Now I am engaged in game development, website creation, and radio technology. I would like to develop in various fields. My hobbies: playing sports, assembling rubik's cube, and of course programming. I want to be a master in their fields, and slowly I'm going to my goal!
